answers.answer: This is what I found searching with Google  http://www.google.com/search?q=byetta+and+pregnancy&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a

question: I have been on Byetta (10) for 2 months now for pre-diabetes.  My doctor also put me on metformin (once a day.)  I have been trying to get pregnant for seven years (have 2 healthy children.)  I have been feeling a little weird, so I just took a pregnancy test and the result was positive.  Just as excited I am...I am also scared to death.  I am probably just 3-4 weeks pregnant.  I immediately stop taking byetta because of the risk I have been reading.  Please let me know of any cases that someone used byetta in the beginning of pregnancy and now has had a healty baby.  Any feedback would be greatly appreciated.
title: Byetta and pregnancy
